actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to consent to the Goose Lake Basin Compact between the States of California and Oregon.

summary.text: Interstate Compact - Gives the consent of the Congress to the Goose Lake Basin Compact between the States of California and Oregon which provides for the development and control of the water resources of Goose Lake Basin.

titles.title: A bill to consent to the Goose Lake Basin Compact between the States of California and Oregon.
